mapper.select: SELECT ttoi.* , toi.* , tri.* , tcc.code_nm FROM tb_tomato_order_info ttoi LEFT JOIN tb_orderer_info toi ON ttoi.orderer_idx = toi.orderer_idx LEFT JOIN tb_receiver_info tri ON tri.receiver_idx = ttoi.receiver_idx LEFT JOIN tb_common_code tcc ON ttoi.tmt_pp_cd = tcc.code ORDER BY ttoi.tmt_ord_idx DESC
